short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds shortcuts for translating and finding conjugations in Kyiv Dictionary

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View translations and conjugations for Ukrainian/English words from Kyiv Dictionary.
Use by highlighting and right clicking a word to get shortcuts for translating and finding conjugations. You can also click the extension icon at the top-right of your browser window to get a manual text input.
